name: Climbing Up A Goshdarned Mountain With One Goshdarned Hand
name_original: Climbing Up A Goshdarned Mountain With One Goshdarned Hand
description:
Rock climbing themed piece of interactive video entertainment made in 48 hours for the 2019 GMTK Game Jam. Using only one arm and one mouse button, perform dazzling feats of ascension, like flinging from one handhold to another, balancing on a slim pole, and punching walls to exploit their speed-boosting effects.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

INSTRUCTIONS: Unzip the downloaded file and then click on the .exe

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
